page.title: 02Granite Quarrying, St.Mary 1
page.content: Granite is one of the most important and durable of building materials in Jersey . It plays an important part in conserving the character of the island's buildings. This quarry is sited at the head of St Peter's Valley They quarry hard pink granite which is used for lots of things i.e ,blocks, slabs,gravel,chippings and hardcore. The company also produces ready mixed concrete .Gravel is exported to Guernsey,but nowhere else. Most of the granite is used in Jersey. The granite is blasted out with explosives which are planted in the cliffs. It is then crushed mixed with cement and moulded into blocks or slabs.{Granite Products employ 43 people.The quarry is 25 years old and is likely to last a few more years. .
